source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_00<tab>Saro Roggo is eager to hear how you fared in your inquiries after Matoya's desires.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_00<tab>マトーヤの洞窟のサロ・ロッゴは、マトーヤの望みを知りたいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_01<tab>Saro Roggo is disappointed to learn that the brooms did not know what his mistress desires. However, he is not willing to give up. He reveals to you that Matoya secretly has one more broom outside of her cave, and he has reason to believe that it possesses knowledge that the others do not. He bids you speak with the brooms in the cave once more, that you might learn the incantation by which their mysterious fellow may be summoned. Begin by consulting the straightforward broom.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_01<tab>サロ・ロッゴに、ホウキたちからはマトーヤの望みについて聞き出せなかったことを報告した。最後の望みは、1本だけ洞窟の外に隠されているホウキだという。マトーヤの洞窟の「一本気なホウキ」と話し、隠されたホウキを呼び出すための呪文について聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_02<tab>Though the straightforward broom is unaware of an incantation, he knows the broom you seek. She is apparently his sister, born of the same wood. He recommends you speak with his brothers, who may have chanced to meet her recently. Approach the statuesque broom and ask him what he knows.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_02<tab>一本気なホウキと話し、隠されたホウキが、彼らの妹にあたる存在だと知った。マトーヤの洞窟の「二枚目なホウキ」からも話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_03<tab>The statuesque broom reveals to you that the incantation is the name of that which is dearest to Matoya. Unfortunately, he does not know what that thing is. He suggests you speak with his brothers in case they have the answer. Seek out the self-possessed broom and ask him what he knows.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_03<tab>二枚目なホウキと話し、呪文はマトーヤの大事なものらしいと知った。マトーヤの洞窟の「三下りなホウキ」からも話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_04<tab>The self-possessed broom is uncertain as to what is dearest to Matoya. However, he seems abundantly confident that she hates Y'shtola above all else. Whether or not you agree, bear your findings back to Saro Roggo and share them with him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_04<tab>三下りなホウキに、マトーヤの大事なものについて聞いた。心当たりがありすぎて選べないそうだが、反対に、嫌いなものは弟子の「シュトラ」だそうだ。マトーヤの洞窟の「サロ・ロッゴ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_05<tab>Saro Roggo is at a loss for what the incantation might be. Desperate as he is, he bids you go to the bridge to the east, where you are to try calling out the names of various things. Use your powers of deduction to ascertain the incantation, and with the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter the word to summon the mystery broom at your destination.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_05<tab>サロ・ロッゴと話した。これまでの証言や、サロ・ロッゴの言葉から、隠されたホウキを呼び出す呪文を推理しよう。呪文がわかったら、低地ドラヴァニアのマトーヤの洞窟東にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C4001 /var>」に向かい、チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで呪文を入力しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_06<tab>No sooner do you speak the correct incantation than a sweeping noise emanates from nearby. Search the area thoroughly for a broom.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_06<tab>呪文を告げたところ、近くで物音と声がした。マトーヤの洞窟東にある橋付近で、「四つ葉なホウキ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_07<tab>Peering behind the steps of the bridge, you find the serendipitous broom sweeping away. You are touched to learn that the knowledge it possesses is none other than all of Matoya's memories pertaining to Y'shtola─from the time she first became her pupil, to the time she left to make her own way in the world. Return to Matoya's Cave and report your discovery to Saro Roggo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_07<tab>四つ葉なホウキと話したが、彼女が持っている知識は、シュトラにまつわる思い出だけだった。マトーヤの洞窟の「サロ・ロッゴ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_08<tab>You relate to Saro Roggo the details of your encounter with the serendipitous broom. Having exhausted all avenues to learn his mistress's desires, he despairs of ever becoming useful to her.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SEQ_08<tab>サロ・ロッゴに報告した。いよいよマトーヤの望みを知るすべがなくなって、サロ・ロッゴは大いに落胆しているようだ。

TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_TODO_04<tab>マトーヤの洞窟東の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C4001 /var>周辺に向かい
チャットの「Say」モードで呪文を告げる

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Should you choose to undertake this quest, you will receive no guidance from the journal or the duty list. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your next course of action.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>本クエストは「探索型クエスト」です。
進行中、ジャーナルや目的リストや地図に、
ヒントが表示されない場合があります。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_001<tab>How fared your inquiries, ribbit? Were you able to learn from the brooms what my mistress desires?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_001<tab>ゲコゲコォ……。
いかがでしたか、お客人様。
マトーヤ様の望みについて、ホウキから聞けたでしょうか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_002<tab>None of them knew!? Inquisitive as they are, I was so certain they possessed the knowledge...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_002<tab>おお、なんと！
まさか誰も知らないとは……。
知りたがりのホウキのくせに、どうにもスカスカ頭ケロ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_003<tab>You have already done much for me, but I must trouble you for one more favor. It is my last resort, ribbit.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_003<tab>お客人様、手を煩わせてすみませんケロ。
けれど、あとひとつ……最後の希望に賭けたいケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_004<tab>My mistress secretly has one more broom, which she keeps outside the cave. I chanced to see her summon it once with some manner of incantation. That it's a special broom is plain to see, and as such I believe it possesses knowledge that the others do not.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_004<tab>……実は、1本だけ、洞窟の外に隠されたホウキがいるケロ。
以前、マトーヤ様が「呪文」を唱えて、
そのホウキを呼び出しているのを見ましたケロ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_005<tab>Now, I know not how to summon this broom, but its fellows here should be able to help you in this, at least. Please speak with them again, ribbit.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_005<tab>あれが特別なホウキなら、何でも知ってるに違いないケロ。
肝心の呪文が聞き取れませんでしたが……
ホウキのことなら、今度こそホウキが知ってるはずケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_010<tab>My mistress secretly has one more broom, which she keeps outside the cave. Please speak with its fellows here and ask them how you can find it, ribbit.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_010<tab>洞窟の外にいる、特別なホウキを呼ぶための呪文……。
ホウキのことなら、今度こそホウキが知ってるはずケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_020<tab>Snruter rerutnevda dnik eht, swish-swish-aroo! Thanks again for bringing me the signpost. If there is aught else you wish to know, please do not hesitate to ask!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_020<tab>マタマタ、ゴヨウデ、サッサカサ！
さっきはどうもアリガトウ。
聞きたいことがあるのなら、今ならサッサと答えまショウ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_021<tab>...I see. I'm not aware of an incantation, but I do know the broom of which you speak. After all, she is my sister, born of the same wood as I am.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_021<tab>……ナルホド、ショウチデ、サッサカサ！
呪文については知らないけれど、確かに外にもホウキはいるヨ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_022<tab>I have not seen her recently, but perhaps my brothers have. You would do well to speak with them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_022<tab>ボクらと同じ木から作られた、柄のツヤツヤした妹チャン。
ほかの兄弟たちならば、最近会っているかもネ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_030<tab>I have not seen my sister recently, but perhaps my brothers have. You would do well to speak with them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMA_000_030<tab>確かに外にもホウキはいるヨ！
ボクらと同じ木から作られた、柄のツヤツヤした妹チャン。
ほかの兄弟たちならば、最近会っているかもネ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_040<tab>Uoy evres I yam woh, swish-swish-aroo? ...You wish to meet our sister, you say? I suppose you did show me your lovely, lovely tears... Very well, I will tell you what I know.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_040<tab>ボクニモ、ゴヨウデ、サッサカサ！
……妹ちゃんに興味があるノ？
彼女はとっても可愛いけれど、手を出さないなら教えてアゲル。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_041<tab>As she is usually outside, we seldom see our sister. But this one time, when we were all getting our bristles cleaned, she taught me how she may be summoned.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_041<tab>妹ちゃんは外にいて、ボクらでさえも、まず会えナイ。
それでもどうにか一度だけ、穂のお手入れで会えたから、
会う方法を聞いたのサ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_042<tab>When we wish to see her, we need but say the name of that which is dearest to our mistress. Unfortunately, I don't know what that thing is. Mayhap one of my brothers will know.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_042<tab>マトーヤ様の大事なモノ……
それを告げてくれたなら、また会えるって彼女は言ッタ。
ボクにはわからないけれど、ほかの兄弟はどうカシラ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_050<tab>If you wish to see our sister, you can summon her by saying the name of that which is dearest to our mistress. Unfortunately, I don't know what that thing is. Mayhap one of my brothers will know.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMB_000_050<tab>マトーヤ様の大事なモノ……
それを告げてくれたなら、また会えるって彼女は言ッタ。
ボクにはわからないけれど、ほかの兄弟はどうカシラ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_060<tab>Em ot semoc <var 08 E905 ((ehs)) ((eh)) /var>, yllanif dna, swish-swish-aroo! So, you wish to know what is dearest to our mistress. That is a difficult question. From her research into aether to her herb garden, much and more is dear to her.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_060<tab>コンドハ、ナニカナ、サッサカサ！
……マトーヤ様の大事なモノ？
研究成果や、秘宝にお茶……いっぱいあって大混乱！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_061<tab>What she loves most, I cannot say, but I know for a fact what she hates above all else: Y'shtola.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_061<tab>いちばん嫌いなものならば、すぐにわかるんだけれどネ。
ほらほら、ご存じ、最後のお弟子……
「シュトラ」のことに決まってル！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_062<tab>How do I know this? Because she never, <var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var> talks about Y'shtola. Why, she goes to great pains to avoid the subject. She wouldn't do that for something she likes, now, would she?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_062<tab>今でもブツクサ文句を言って、あれは相当嫌いだネ！
何かにつけて、やれ「シュトラ」！
まったくもって……サッサカサ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_070<tab>What my mistress loves most, I cannot say, but I know for a fact what she hates above all else: her last pupil, Y'shtola.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMC_000_070<tab>いちばん嫌いなものならば、すぐにわかるんだけれどネ。
ほらほら、ご存じ、最後のお弟子……
「シュトラ」のことに決まってル！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_080<tab>Were you able to learn it, ribbit? The incantation by which we might summon my mistress's secret broom?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_080<tab>ゲコゲーコ！
特別なホウキを呼ぶ呪文、無事に判明したのでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_081<tab>Er, so it's the name of that which is dearest to her, but we only know for certain that she hates Y'shtola above all else...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_081<tab>ふむふむ、なるほど、ケロケロケロ……。
マトーヤ様の大事なもの……。
「シュトラ」が嫌いで……サッ……サカサ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_082<tab>Why, that isn't helpful in the least! <croak>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_082<tab>……ゲコゲゴゲコォ！
ち～～～っともわからないケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_083<tab>But we can't give up─not yet. 'Twas at the bridge east of here that my mistress summoned the broom. Please go there and try calling out the names of various things. You're bound to stumble upon the right word...eventually.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_083<tab>お客人様、もしも呪文がわかったならば、
ここより東の橋のあたりで、叫んでみてほしいケロ。
前に見たマトーヤ様は、そこでホウキと会っていたケロ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>It appears you must incant the spell somewhere to the east of Matoya's Cave.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>マトーヤの洞窟の東にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C4001 /var>」周辺で、
呪文を唱える必要がありそうだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the incantation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、
キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで呪文を入力しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_090<tab>'Twas at the bridge east of here that my mistress summoned the broom. Please go there and try calling out the names of various things.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_090<tab>マトーヤ様の大事なもの……。
「シュトラ」が嫌いで……サッ……サカサ……。
…………ゲコォ、ちっともわからないケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_091<tab>We know for certain that my mistress hates Y'shtola above all else, so that's one fewer word you need to try. You're bound to stumble upon the right word...eventually.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_091<tab>お客人様、もしも呪文がわかったならば、
ここより東の橋のあたりで、叫んでみてほしいケロ。
前に見たマトーヤ様は、そこでホウキと会っていたケロ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the incantation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、
キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで呪文を入力しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You hear the sound of sweeping nearby...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>呪文を告げると、近くで物音がした……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_101<tab>(-???-)Gniveileb si gnipeews, swish-swish-aroo. Who is it that summons me?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_101<tab>(-？？？？-)……フシギナ、ジュモン、サ、サッサカサ。
ワタシのことを、お呼びですカ……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_110<tab>You are <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> who summoned me?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_110<tab>オヨビ、デシタカ、サッサカサ……。
見たところ、旅のお方のようですネ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_111<tab>I desire nothing of you, save that you desire nothing of me. I possess no knowledge that could possibly be of use to you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_111<tab>ワタシは何も望みませんから、
どうか、ワタシに望みませんヨウ……。
お役にたてる知識など、これっぽっちもないのデス。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_112<tab>For my mistress has imparted unto me naught but memories─the memories of a young Y'shtola.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_112<tab>ワタシがマトーヤ様から授かったのは、
「思い出」という名の知識……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_113<tab>The warmth of her hands. Her determined countenance. Her blossoming into a woman grown. Every mundane conversation they shared. Her sudden departure. The painful farewell.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_113<tab>小さなシュトラのあたたかな手や、
彼女の起こした失敗のコト……成長のコト……。
使命を負って旅立つまでの、他愛もない会話の記録……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_114<tab>My mistress cannot bear to have these memories near, but neither does she wish to forget them. So it was that she entrusted them to my safekeeping and bade me remain hidden.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_114<tab>マトーヤ様は、それらを傍に置けないお方。
ゆえにワタシは洞窟を出て、
この知識を、ひっそり守っているのデス。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_115<tab>I can tell you naught more. Pray leave me to my sweeping.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_115<tab>……わかっていただけましたでしょうカ。
どうかどうか、ササッとお引き取りくださいマセ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_120<tab>My mistress has imparted unto me naught but memories. I possess no knowledge that could possibly be of use to you. Pray leave me to my sweeping.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_BROOMSISTER01970_000_120<tab>ワタシがマトーヤ様から授かったのは、
「思い出」という名の知識……。
お役にたてる知識など、これっぽっちもないのデス。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_130<tab>You succeeded in summoning the secret broom!? Huzzah! I knew you could do it! So, what did the broom tell you, ribbit?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_130<tab>ゲ、ゲコォ！？
まさか、ホウキと会えたのですか！
さすがケロ……それで、そのホウキは何と？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_131<tab>...That's truly the way of it? B-But I can scarcely become Y'shtola. Or anything else, for that matter. And now I've exhausted all avenues to learn my mistress's desires...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_131<tab>……な、なんてことケロ。
わたくしめでは、シュトラ様には到底なれない……。
ゲコォ……完全に行き詰まったケロ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_132<tab>Oh, woe is me! Useless as I am, I'm doomed to become a mindless, speechless toad! <croak>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAROROGGO_000_132<tab>ゲコゲコゲーコ、もうだめだ……！
わたくしめは、何の役にも立てない、能なしポロッゴ！
きっと今に、ただのトードに戻されるケロ～～～ッ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAY_000_000<tab>Y'shtola
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAY_000_000<tab>シュトラ

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAY_000_001<tab>Aloths'y
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ905_01970_SAY_000_001<tab>ラトュシ
